content: a silly bear pattern that sits in my hand nicely i used worsted weight size 4 yarn and a 3 5 mm hook you can use any yarn you would like just make sure to adjust your hook as well my finished bear came out to be around 5 inches tall but the size may change depending on what material and hook you use recommended materials -any color worsted weight yarn -size 3 5 mm crochet hook -darning needle preferably metal -stitch marker -sewing needle and thread -a couple of pins to hold pieces in place while attaching -two or more/less buttons of your choice for the eyes -something to stuff the bear with such as polyfil or scrap yarn -thin black yarn for the nose -scissors this pattern requires you to sew around 11 crocheted body pieces to the main body if you use this pattern please create a project i d like to see what you made
